heroSubtitle: DAN na haɗa manoma, masu rarrabawa, da masu saka hannun jari a kan wani dandali mai aminci da gaskiya. Kasuwanci, bibiya, da ma'amala da karfin gwiwa.
featuresTitle: Sabon Zamani na Cinikin Aikin Noma
featuresSubtitle: An gina dandalinmu a kan fasahar zamani don tabbatar da adalci, gaskiya, da inganci.
featureDirectSourcingDesc: Haɗa kai tsaye da manoma don samun amfanin gona mafi sabo ba tare da masu shiga tsakani ba.
featureSecureEscrowDesc: Ana riƙe biyan kuɗi a cikin escrow kuma ana sakewa ta atomatik bayan an tabbatar da isarwa.
featureTransparentLogisticsDesc: Bibiyi odar ku a ainihin lokacin daga gona zuwa sito ɗinku tare da ingantaccen tsarin bibiyar mu.
featureMarketInsightsDesc: Samun damar bayanai na ainihi da nazari don yanke shawara mafi wayo na siye da saka hannun jari.
testimonial1Quote: DAN ya kawo sauyi kan yadda nake sayar da amfanin gona na. Ina samun farashi mafi kyau da biyan kuɗi cikin sauri.
testimonial2Quote: Gaskiya da tsaron dandalin sun canza wasa ga hanyar sadarwar mu ta rarrabawa.
testimonial3Quote: A matsayina na mai saka hannun jari, a ƙarshe zan iya shiga kasuwar noma da kwarin gwiwa da haske.
ctaTitle: A Shirye kake ka Shiga Juyin Juya Halin?
ctaSubtitle: Ƙir����iri asusu a yau kuma ku fuskanci makomar kasuwancin noma.

disputeModal.title: Bude Rigima
disputeModal.description: Da fatan za a bayyana matsalar da odar ku. Wani mai gudanarwa zai duba korafin ku.
disputeModal.reasonPlaceholder: Misali, kayan ba kamar yadda aka bayyana ba, ba a isar ba...
disputeModal.fileErrorType: Dole ne fayil ya zama hoto.
disputeModal.fileErrorSize: Dole ne fayil ya kasance ƙasa da {{size}}KB.

kyc.title: Tabbatar da KYC
kyc.description: Tabbatar da asalin ka don buɗe dukkan fasalulluka na dandamali.

verified.title: An tabbatar da asusunka!
verified.description: Kuna da cikakken damar zuwa dukkan fasalulluka na dandamali.

pending.title: Tabbatarwa na Gudana
pending.description: AI ɗinmu na nazarin takardunku. Wannan na iya ɗaukar 'yan mintuna.

form.docTypePlaceholder: Katin Shaida na Kasa, Fasfo, Lasisin Tuki

toast.submitted: An mika takardun KYC don dubawa. (Wannan demo ne)
toast.verified: An yi nasarar tabbatar da KYC!
toast.error: An kasa mika KYC. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.

payment.title: Hanyoyin Biyan Kuɗi
payment.description: Sarrafa hanyoyin biyan kuɗi da aka haɗa.

disabledAlert.title: An Kashe Gudanarwa
disabledAlert.description: Ba za ku iya canza hanyoyin biyan kuɗi ba yayin da kuke da oda masu aiki. Da fatan za a kammala ko soke dukkan oda da farko.

admin.title: Kwamitin Gudanarwa
admin.description: Sarrafa masu amfani da dandamali da saituna.

users.title: Gudanar da Mai amfani
users.description: Duba da sarrafa duk masu amfani da aka yiwa rajista a kan dandamali.

toast.roleError: An kasa sabunta matsayin mai amfani.
toast.promoteSuccess: An ɗaukaka mai amfani zuwa Admin.

promoteCard.title: Ɗaukaka Mai amfani zuwa Admin
promoteCard.description: Shigar da adireshin imel na mai amfani don ba su damar gudanarwa.

transactions.title: Ma'amaloli
transactions.description: Duba duk ma'amaloli a kan dandamali.

education.title: Cibiyar Ilimi
education.description: Makamashin ku don ilimin kasuwancin noma da basira.

defi.title: Fahimtar Kuɗin da aka Rarraba a Aikin Noma
defi.description: Bincika yadda blockchain da DeFi ke canza hanyoyin samar da noma.

sustainable.title: Mafi Kyawun Ayyuka don Noma Mai Dorewa
sustainable.description: Koyi game da dabarun zamani da ke inganta amfanin gona yayin kare muhalli.

markets.title: Kewaya Kasuwannin Abinci na Duniya
markets.description: Binciken yanayin kasuwa na yanzu, sauye-sauyen farashi, da yadda ake yanke shawara.

kyc.title: Matsayin KYC wajen Gina Amincewa
kyc.description: Dalilin da ya sa tabbatar da ainihi yana da mahimmanci don ƙirƙirar kasuwar noma mai aminci.

logistics.title: Inganta Kayan Aiki da Sarkar Samarwa
logistics.description: Tukwici da dabaru ga masu rarrabawa don daidaita ayyukansu da rage farashi.

tokenization.title: Gabatarwa ga Tokenization na Noma
tokenization.description: Jagora ga masu farawa kan yadda za a iya wakiltar kadarorin noma a matsayin alamun dijital.

aiChat.title: Mataimakin DAN AI
aiChat.greeting: Sannu! Ni ne AI na Decentralized Agribusiness Network. Tambaye ni komai game da farashin kasuwa, kayan aiki, ko fasalulluka na dandalinmu.

danAI.title: DAN. AI
danAI.description: Mataimakin ku na AI don bayanan kasuwa na ainihi da basira.

cropHealthAI.title: Lafiyar Amfanin Gona AI
cropHealthAI.description: Yi amfani da AI don gano cututtukan amfanin gona da wuri daga hotunan tauraron dan adam.
cropHealthAI.analysisDesc: Zaɓi nau'in amfanin gona, sannan yi amfani da wurinka don binciken hoton tauraron dan adam.
cropHealthAI.permissionDenied: An hana izinin wuri. Da fatan za a kunna shi a cikin saitunan burauzarka.
cropHealthAI.mayTakeMoment: Wannan na iya ɗaukar ɗan lokaci...

healthy.recommendation: Amfanin gona yana da lafiya. Ci gaba da sa ido na yau da kullun da jadawalin ban ruwa. Babu buƙatar wani mataki na gaggawa.

stress.recommendation: An gano matsakaiciyar damuwar ruwa a yankin arewa maso yamma. Ana ba da shawarar ƙara yawan ban ruwa da 15% da kuma sa ido.

fungus.disease: Mai Yiwuwa Kamuwa da Cutar Fungal
fungus.recommendation: Alamun da suka dace da cutar fungal a matakin farko. Ana ba da shawarar binciken samfurin ƙasa da kuma yin la'akari da amfani da maganin fungicides.

corn_blight.recommendation: Raunuka suna nuna NCLB. Yi la'akari da amfani da maganin fungicides na ganye idan cutar ta yadu kuma amfanin gona bai yi toho ba.

avocado_rot.recommendation: Alamun suna nuna Phytophthora cinnamomi. Inganta magudanar ruwa na ƙasa nan da nan kuma yi la'akari da amfani da maganin fungicide na tushen phosphite.

ginger_wilt.recommendation: Babban yiwuwar Ralstonia solanacearum. Cire da lalata tsire-tsire masu cuta. Aiwatar da juyin amfanin gona kuma a guji shuka a wannan gonar na akalla shekaru 3.

error.openOrderExists: Kuna da oda a bude don wannan samfurin. Da fatan za a warware ta kafin ƙirƙirar sabon lissafi.

payment.title: Kammala Biyan Kuɗinka
payment.description: Kammala ma'amalarka cikin aminci don Oda #{{orderId}}.

error.title: Kuskuren Biyan Kuɗi
error.fetch: An kasa loda bayanan oda. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
error.generic: An sami kuskuren da ba a sani ba.

toast.success: An yi nasarar biyan kuɗi! Ana tura ka zuwa odarka...

ordersPage.title: Ododi Na
ordersPage.description: Duba da sarrafa duk ma'amaloli na baya da na yanzu.
ordersPage.noOrders: Ba ku taɓa yin ko karɓar wata oda ba tukuna.
